amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 638 related to section 129 of the Truth in Lending Act (15 U.S.C. 1639).
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 16 printed in House Report 114-639 to strike section 638.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 255 (Roll no. 368).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 255 (Roll no. 368).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Ellison.
